## Shortcuts

|                            | Windows          | Mac              |
|----------------------------|------------------|------------------|
| add chunk                  | Ctrl + Alt + I   | Cmd + Option + I |
| run the current chunk      | Ctrl + Alt + C   | Cmd + Option + C |
| run current line/selection | Ctrl + Enter     | Cmd + Return     |
| knit                       | Ctrl + Shift + K | Cmd + Shift + K  |
